i18n.title: Generics in Go 1.18
i18n.description: This lab introduces the concept of generics in Golang. Starting from version 1.18, Golang has added support for generics, which allows us to write more flexible and reusable code.

meta.title: Generics in Go 1.18: Unlocking Flexible and Reusable Code
meta.description: Explore the power of generics in Golang 1.18, enabling you to write more versatile and reusable code.
meta.keywords: generics, type parameters, go, golang, go labs, go playground online, constraints, go lab, go practice

verify.name: Verify Go Generics Implementation
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go 1.18中的泛型
i18n.description: 本实验介绍了Go语言中泛型的概念。从1.18版本开始，Go语言增加了对泛型的支持，这使我们能够编写更灵活、可复用的代码。

meta.title: Go 1.18中的泛型：解锁灵活且可复用的代码
meta.description: 探索Go 1.18中泛型的强大功能，让你能够编写更通用、可复用的代码。
meta.keywords: 泛型, 类型参数, Go, Go语言, Go实验, 在线Go游乐场, 约束, Go实验, Go练习

verify.name: 验证Go泛型实现
